name: .NSZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .NSZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use nsz to decompress an NSZ archive into an NSP file. Then, you can install or open the resulting NSP file using the custom Nintendo Switch firmware or emulator of your choice. You can also install NSZ files directly using Awoo-Installer or GoldBricks.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
